item.title: ASP.NET Core WebAPI Payload Logging with Serilog
item.description: Goal: In this article, we will look at how to log HTTP API request/response payloads in an ASP.NET Core Web API using the Serilog logger and the HTTP Logging Middleware provided by Microsoft. Why: In some API-based applications, logging the payload for a given API transaction is helpful from both audit and monitoring perspectives. While it’s generally not recommended to log the request or response body due to performance considerations, if there is a need for such a requirement and you understand the risks, then hopefully this guide provides one of the many ways to achieve it.
